document_data.mainbody:
Lord Gante Demelin was a half-elf fighter and commander of the fortress of Emmech, known as Undumor after its conquest by Thayan forces. As of , he kept his fortress prepared against any eventuality, being uneasy with the peace that there was with the Red Wizards. Demelin was a marshal of Aglarond in 1372 DR.
He still ruled the fortress in .
